hicpp-invalid-access-moved.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
bugprone-use-after-move
.

Implements parts of the
rule 8.4.1
to check if moved-from objects are accessed.
hicpp-invalid-access-moved.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
